The name of the movie is "An Inconvienent Truth", and it's narrated by Al Gore:
 
 http://www.videosift.com/story.php?id=1422
 
 Supposedly, this is the "most terrifying movie you'll ever see". It looks as though the entire planet is doomed, unless we care enough to stop it.
 
 I guess it's another global warming movie, one where all the worst-case scenarios happed all together at once.

title: 4Forums.com Political Debates and Polls -  Al Gore's new movie (trailer)
